thread.title: Celebs Are Paying Tribute To President Obama After His Farewell Address
thread.title_full: Celebs Are Paying Tribute To President Obama After His Farewell Address

author: Ellie Bate
title: Celebs Are Paying Tribute To President Obama After His Farewell Address
text:
View this image ‚Ä∫
Nicholas Kamm / AFP / Getty Images ID: 10305141 2. He also tweeted his thanks to the American people, and stressed the importance of believing in the ability to create change. Thank you for everything. My last ask is the same as my first. I'm asking you to believe‚Äînot in my ability to create change, but in yours.
‚Äî President Obama (@POTUS) ID: 10305235 3. First Lady Michelle Obama also tweeted this adorable photo of the family at the beginning of Obama‚Äôs presidency, and expressed her pride in all they‚Äôve accomplished. So proud of @POTUS and all that we've accomplished together. An incredible journey filled with remarkable people. I‚Ä¶ https://t.co/5cwy8KAdQc
‚Äî The First Lady (@FLOTUS) ID: 10305270 4. After the address, celebrities took to social media to express their gratitude to the president. Many shared photos of POTUS and FLOTUS captioned with a simple ‚Äúthank you‚Äù. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @arianagrande ID: 10305294 Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @zendaya ID: 10305304 Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @gigihadid ID: 10305445 Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @vanessahudgens ID: 10305307 8. Madonna called the president ‚Äúa king amongst men‚Äù. Good-bye Mr. President! üá∫üá∏There will never be another one like you! üôèüèª Barack Obama you are a King amongst Men. üëëüá∫üá∏‚Ä¶ https://t.co/S7SC6NBQ4h
‚Äî Madonna (@Madonna) ID: 10305586 9. Miley Cyrus thanked President Obama on behalf of her organisation, the Happy Hippie Foundation, for all he‚Äôs done for LGBT people. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @mileycyrus ID: 10305326 10. Author Stephen King wrote a tribute on Twitter, and played on the whole ‚Äúthanks, Obama‚Äù thing. Hope you enjoyed Obama's speech. You won't hear anything so cogent and kind for a long time. So, with complete sincerity: THANKS, OBAMA.
‚Äî Stephen King (@StephenKing) ID: 10305461 11. Ellen DeGeneres expressed her love for President Obama. .@POTUS @BarackObama I love you more than I have space on Twitter to describe. #ObamaFarewell
‚Äî Ellen DeGeneres (@TheEllenShow) ID: 10305618 12. Whoopi Goldberg referenced president elect Donald Trump‚Äôs proposed ‚Äúvictory tour‚Äù. This is what a REAL victory lap looks like and that only works if you have actually done something to to take a lap for.
‚Äî Whoopi Goldberg (@WhoopiGoldberg) ID: 10305696 13. Director Ava DuVernay thanked the president, and shared a video highlighting his work with the American prison system. "Our Constitution is... really just a piece of parchment. We, the people, give it power." Thank you, Mr. President.
‚Äî Ava DuVernay (@ava) ID: 10305477 14. Lena Dunham wrote a lengthy caption, saying it was ‚Äúan honor and privilege‚Äù to have voted for Obama and thanking him for his ‚Äúdignity, grace, and passion‚Äù. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @lenadunham ID: 10305335 15. And Amy Schumer shared this photo of herself with the president on a cereal box, because why not? Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @amyschumer ID: 10305311 16. Amber Riley thanked Obama for ‚Äúmaking history and changing lives‚Äù. Farewell President Obama. You made history and changed lives. Because of you, many of us now know that WE CAN! Thank you @POTUS
‚Äî Amber Patrice Riley (@MsAmberPRiley) ID: 10305514 17. Ciara shared this photo of herself meeting the president. Thank You Mr. President. #ObamaFarewell
‚Äî Ciara (@ciara) ID: 10305533 18. Olivia Wilde shared memories of working on Obama‚Äôs campaign all the way back in 2008. Working on @BarackObama's 2008 campaign made me love this country. It made me believe in us. I won't let that go. Thank you, Mr President.
‚Äî olivia wilde (@oliviawilde) ID: 10305493 19. And Sophia Bush also said it was an honour. Oh Mr. President... it has been my honor to work in this administration. Thank you ... #ObamaFarewell #MyPresident‚Ä¶ https://t.co/bbJoIURMYm
‚Äî Sophia Bush (@SophiaBush) ID: 10305500 20. Pretty Little Liars‚Äô Troian Bellisario shared a photo of the president alongside a poignant Quote: . Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @sleepinthegardn ID: 10305341 21. Nancy Sinatra shared her thanks. Thank you, thank you, thank you from my heart, Mr. President. @BarackObama
‚Äî Nancy Sinatra (@NancySinatra) ID: 10305508 22. Kathy Bates expressed her gratitude. So grateful to you @POTUS for all you have done for us these last 8 years! Your dignity and strength. God Bless you and your family.
‚Äî Kathy Bates (@MsKathyBates) ID: 10305670 23. And Kerry Washington shared this simple sentiment. YES WE CAN #obamafarewell
‚Äî kerry washington (@kerrywashington) ID: 10305683
Ellie Bate is a celebrity reporter at BuzzFeed UK and is based in London.
